module: Module-level comment: The Computer_System_VGA_Subsystem manages VGA display outputs in a computer system by orchestrating data flow and synchronization between multiple internal components. It processes and synchronizes pixel data via VGA Alpha Blender, Char Buffer, Controller, PLL, Dual Clock FIFO, and Pixel DMA blocks, managing comprehensive video signal generation and handling from data receipt to VGA output, synced to system and VGA-specific clocks.
